titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Ms. Coll. 390 Item 2559: Pārthivapūjā

notesStmt.note: Fair condition. A portion of the folio is torn off, damaging four lines of text. Mistakes blotched out with black. Marginal corrections.

Begins: oṁ harāya namaḥ mṛdāharaṇaṁ maheśvarāya namaḥ saṁghaṭanaṁ śūlapāṇaye namaḥ pratiṣṭhāpanaṁ oṁ dhyāye nityaṁ maheśaṁ rajatagirinabhaṁ cārucaṁdrāvataṁ saṁratnākalpojvalāṁgaṁ paruśuṁ.
Ends: oṁ kīlakāya namaḥ sarvāṅge vyāpakam pārthivapūjāsamāptam.

msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts
